body: /* @font-face {	font-family: "Whitney";	font-style: normal;	font-weight: normal;	src: url(../fonts/Whitney-Book.woff2) format("woff2");} */:root {	--typo1: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;}*, ::before, ::after {	margin: 0;	padding: 0;	box-sizing: border-box;}html {	font-size: 62.5%;}body {	min-height: 100vh;	font-family: var(--typo1);	font-size: 1.8rem;}input, button, textarea, select {	font: inherit;}
